message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this valuable product. Given its worth, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,300,000. I'm open to discussing this further if you have any thoughts.
I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, thanks for your counter-offer. I understand your perspective on the value.  To be fair to both of us, I could come down to $1,150,000. This is a significant reduction on my end, reflecting my willingness to find a mutually beneficial agreement.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit far off from $1,150,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counter with $1,025,000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
